name: tm72
effect: Teaches Avalanche to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Volt Switch to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Avalanche)

flavor_text.sun_moon: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
